document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2009-10
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON APPROVING ZONING ORDINANCE AMENDMENT ZOA 08-03, MAKING MINOR REVISIONS AND TECHNICAL CORRECTIONS TO CHAPTERS 19.40 - REVIEW AND APPROVAL PROCEDURES, 19.41 - DESIGN PERMITS, AND 19.44 - MINOR VARIATIONS
